channel.title: jan Api on lipu kule
channel.description: Recent content in jan Api on lipu kule

item.title: jan pi moli ala
item.description: tenpo kama la, mi wile ala moli. mi wile awen lon tenpo ale. (nimi pi pu ala: monsuta, misikeke, majuna) sina o sona e ni: mi toki musi e moli e ijo ante ike. mi wile e ni: sitelen ni li musi. taso, o lukin e pilin sina. pilin ken la, sina toki e ni: â€œtaso, jan Api o, jan pi moli ala li pilin ike, li jo ala e jan pona e jan olin e nasin.
